content: Just sharing an opportunity for DevDays, June 7-10, please pass along: For those in low and lower-middle-income countries, an opportunity to register at a discounted fee is available. The fee for those from Africa is $50 USD. The fee for other low and lower-middle-income countries is $100 USD (early bird before May 14, 2021) and $150 USD (regular after May 14, 2021). Instructions to apply : https://www.devdays.com/june-2021/registration/
